评论详情: This off the shoulder Sweater is so cute!
Fit my daughter perfectly! She absolutely loves the softness and fit!

This sweater was well made and I liked the feel of it but it ran very small. I ordered a large.  I normally wear a 10-12 or a large.  I really liked it but was concerned even an XL would be small so I didn’t reorder.
I hardly ever write reviews, but wanted to share this sweater is not only warm for winter outings, it’s super soft. And looks great! Definitely buy if you’re in the fence!

评论概述: NOT white at all - it's cream
评论详情: Quality was fine but I wanted white. Call me crazy, it said it was white so I ordered it. I guess elves got to the package en route and changed the color to cream. Either way...it's off white, not white. So if you don't care about the color.. Other than that, this is good quality. I have a hard time keeping the off the shoulder, actually off the shoulder. Sweaters/tops like this never stay down. Would be cute in a picture - or if you had a helpful friend/SO other around to help you keep it in place. But that's just a me thing - I shouldn't have ordered a style like this but one can always dream....oh, maybe there is some kind of way to tack down the edge so it stays in place? Either way, it was returned.
I bought one in white for my daughter and she loves it!! It’s soft the perfect fit and very stylish.
It looks nice on and is made of a good quality.
Cannot wait to wear this! super cute

评论概述: Goes up hard to stay on
评论详情: Skip it
Fits great! I got an XS. Got a lot of compliments ☺️ Great quality especially for the price.

I bought this sweater after seeing it recommended by an influencer on Instagram. I’ve purchased several items through her recommendations, and they’ve all been great! Unfortunately, this sweater didn’t live up to my expectations. I wore it for the first time to a friend’s birthday party at a club, and it started to rip shortly after I arrived. I tried to not move as much to prevent further damage, but the tear got worse until my arm was completely exposed. I had to leave early, which was really disappointing. I’ve bought a lot of clothes from Amazon and have never had a bad experience until now. It’s a shame because the sweater was super cute, but it ended up being a waste of money.

Always impressed with SUUKSESS brand items and this sweater is no different. So soft and has the perfect slouchy fit. Stretchy, but doesn’t stretch out while wearing. Flattering fit, and just overall amazing quality.

I give three stars because it was packaged with clear paper and it was a gift so my daughter saw what it was and did not feel the need to wait till xmas since she could already see it. Other than that she said it was good material and true to size.
The shirt is made out of good quality however, it rolls up with movement of your hands will not purchase again and will return.
it came ripped in one of the arms but k can’t return it because i didn’t have the bag where it came on. so sad because it seemed good quality
I wanted it so bad but when it arrived it was too loose on the body. Sent it back

I ordered a size small but I should’ve gotten an xsmall. The sleeves are very long I have the folded up here, it’s a bit longer than in the model photo and not as tight. I don’t mind a little looseness in the torso and its length since I don’t like cropped stuff but I wish the sleeves were tighter fitted so it’d make me look less frumpy. The off-the-shoulder part does roll up if you move your shoulders a lot or lift up your arms all the way but thats to be expected in off-the-shoulder tops. I will say that the color is accurate, it’s warm to wear and soft to the touch, and it’s stretchy. Was hoping to wear this to a party but I might try looking for something else.

评论概述: The sweater I ordered was exactly what I wanted.
评论详情: This was a gift & it got here a day earlier than expected. Very pleased.
Top did not have the tag intact and it had a weird scent to it along with what looks like cat or dog hair.
Beautiful sweater. Fits true to size.

评论概述: Stitches along the whole arm of came off
评论详情: The sweater was worn once by my daughter and all the stitches along the arm just came off. It seemed as if the stitching was not done properly. Very unhappy with it.
Fits well. Nice color and keeps me warm.

In the sea of false advertisements and Amazon returns lately, I found a keeper. This is such a high quality sweater. Love the color, fit and look of it so much I want to order other colors! Highly recommend!
This sweater is pretty, and quality seems good, but the part that folds over at the shoulders absolutely does not stay down. It’s unfortunate.
I purchased a large and it was not an accurate more like a small and  did Not seem to fit off shoulder like in the picture so I had to return mine
This sweater exceeded my expectations. So flattering. Wow. True to size. I wear between a 6 and an 8 and ordered the medium.

I ordered based on the chart recommendation and the medium fits as expected.  I’m a 36b and based on its chart medium was the correct size.  I ordered the white sweater and it’s lovely.  This sweater is sexy, soft, and comfortable to wear so I’m looking forward to styling it on a date.

评论概述: Just didnt fit like it looks
评论详情: Nice material; Didnt fit/look like expected from the picture.
I love this top. The material is soft and it fits well. The style is flattering even of small chests.

This sweater is made of thick, heavy material that feels super cozy and warm. The sleeves are a bit long, covering my hands, and have a snug (but comfortable) fit that I really like. The bright red color is festive and perfect for the holidays!
The sweater itself is fine, it’s good quality and true to size but I had ordered the khaki one and instead got sent the red one.

I’m obsessed with this brand—all their pieces are incredibly high quality. Although this isn’t my favorite item from their collection, the craftsmanship is still impressive. The material is thick, but I feel the fit could be improved. I wish I had sized down, as it does run a bit large. Besides this, I would recommend this top, nonetheless, this entire brand.

The sweater is very soft and a nice quality.  I have yet to wash it, so I cannot remark on whether the shape will be maintained. I  probably would have ordered a size small to get the fit as depicted in the photo advertised. A medium fit nice (5'7"/140) but slightly large.

Beautiful off the shoulder soft knit sweater in the hottest color of the season. It is a beautiful Cocoa colored brown. I’m in the xtra small, at 5ft 5in and 110lbs. It’s fitted, but not clingy. It folds beautifully showing your shoulders and doesn’t move because of the lining. The quality of this sweater for the price is incredible. I would think this is a 100$ sweater. I’m buying in another color immediately.

This off-shoulder sweater is perfect for autumn nights out! The ribbed knitting adds a nice texture, and it feels cozy yet stylish. It’s versatile enough to dress up or down, making it a great addition to my fall wardrobe. I love the way it fits and looks—definitely recommend!
It's so beautiful and excellent quality.
Great fitting sweater and very flattering.Love the softness.

This sweater is so soft & comfortable. It is definitely a fitted design/cut but it’s also very stretchy. The fabric is like wearing a cloud & the color is stunning. Can’t wait to wear this to holiday parties. Highly recommend!
This off the shoulder sweater is light weight and chic! Sweater is soft and fits as expected.

i am surprised how good the material of this sweaters.  very comfortable , soft and stretchy. the off shoulder is nice, true to size, for preference,  i am 5'2, bust 34C, waist 24, ordered size S, fit me well.  love this  sweater.
